Dissolve into pure anima, dramatically increasing your movement speed, slowing your falling speed, and propelling you forward.

Reduces the radius at which enemies will detect you for the duration.
Instantly cast an empowered Holy Shock, Avenger's Shield, or Judgment, that strikes all nearby targets.

Fuse yourself into an enemy or ally. You become untargetable by enemies, but are unable to attack or cast spells.

If the enemy is your level or lower, take control of them for the duration.
Swear an oath in blood, immediately removing most harmful effects from yourself and causing your abilities to deal additional damage or healing equal to the health spent on this ability.
Turn into a Spirit Fox, increasing your movement speed and causing enemies to ignore you.

Create a Lightgrove at the targeted area, restoring health to you and an injured ally every 3 sec.

Judgment has a chance to not incur its cooldown when cast against an enemy within the Lightgrove.
Bend through the shadows, appearing at the targeted location.

Draw the Light into you, draining health from nearby enemies to restore yourself.

Draining at least one enemy causes your next ability to be a guaranteed critical strike.
